meanings.definition: The act of growing together or fusing.
meanings.sent1: The adnations of the tree branches created a beautiful canopy in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The adnations of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to separate them.
meanings.sent3: The adnations of the vegetables in the stew made it look like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The adnations of the two cultures resulted in a unique blend of traditions.
meanings.sent5: The adnations of the colors in the painting gave it a vibrant and cohesive look.

meanings.definition: The state of being grown together or fused.
meanings.sent1: The adnations of the vines on the wall created a natural tapestry.
meanings.sent2: The adnations of the metal parts made the structure incredibly strong.
meanings.sent3: The adnations of the flavors in the dish made it taste surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: The adnations of the ideas in the discussion led to a breakthrough solution.
meanings.sent5: The adnations of the fabrics in the quilt gave it a cozy and unified appearance.
